query:
SELECT
            COALESCE(db.id, di.id) as "id!",
            d.uploaded
        FROM
            "Document" d
        LEFT JOIN LATERAL (
            SELECT
                i.id
            FROM
                "DocumentInstance" i
            WHERE
                i."documentId" = d.id
            ORDER BY
                i."createdAt" ASC
            LIMIT 1
        ) di ON d."fileType" IS DISTINCT FROM 'docx'
        LEFT JOIN LATERAL (
            SELECT
                b.id
            FROM
                "DocumentBom" b
            WHERE
                b."documentId" = d.id
            ORDER BY
                b."createdAt" ASC
            LIMIT 1
        ) db ON d."fileType" = 'docx'
        WHERE
            d.id = $1
        LIMIT 1
